long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the "Joky" Chrome extension! With just one click, this extension will bring a smile to your face with a hilarious, randomly-generated joke. Whether you need a quick pick-me-up during a long workday or just want to make your friends laugh, Joky has got you covered. Plus, with new jokes added regularly, you'll never run out of material. Add Joky to your browser now and start laughing!
